name: Jim Finley
text: Ordered the thun crust veggie pizza. It was delivered hot and delicious within 20 minutes. Originally when I ordered it said it would be an hour. The delivery guy very professional and courteous left the pizza on the back porch. Will definitely order again.

name: Love Smith
text: I can't believe I received this level of food from this establishment I'm very disappointed dough raw no meat or cheese 14.82 for this

name: Karen Jensen
text: I highly recommend it to anyone. Brilliant value for money, honestly just wonderful in all ways!

name: Zayn Nasser
text: Best pizzas in town. Stingy with the toppings sometimes.

name: Sonic R
text:
Great pizza, made right every time.
We order pizza here regularly, ever since Hungry Howies has offered stuffed crust,  much better than Pizza Hut stuffed crust. And you can get the trademark flavor crust with stuffed crust!

name: Michael Szabo
text: Best Howies around. Staff and pizza are top notch.

name: B Oliver
text: Live less than 5 mins away, delivery took over an hour and the pizza was barely warm by the time it got here. Salad was good tho.

name: Brian Marusak
text: I've been getting pizza from this franchise for as long as I can remember.  Even as a little kid, I wondered about the giant sign and how Hungry Howie could possibly eat through a pizza with a giant head and a tiny hole for his neck!  Now, â€¦More

name: Josh Wilson
text: They ate my bread for my order and I had to sit and wait while they made me a new one. Thank you, hungry howies. Wasted my time and money.

name: Jim Boddy
text: Good pizza!!

name: Jeanette Zawol
text: What a wonderful place to receive a pizza

name: Thomas Mosher
text: Great pizza. Love it. Staff is very friendly.

name: Dan Rakoczy
text: Our go to pizza place for pick up or delivery. Always on time and the flavored crust is great.

name: Matthew DeNoyer
text: Little Caesars tastes better

name: Jennifer Hastings
text: Yummy pizza and easy online ordering

name: Paul Jacobs
text: Word of caution about this Hungry Howie's; it is a franchised owned store so whatever you order online from the website will be different than what the store actually makes. I was told that they make everything the old way. Food still tasted fine but this information on different foods needs to be indicated.

name: John W
text: Great place.

name: Kpop Addict
text: My to go place for quality pizza. Other wise I just stop at Little Cesar's.

text: The pizza sauce is #1

text: Got carry out was still hot when we got home. We will come back.

text: Great pizza! Kids love it so much. Freshly baked.

name: Adam Verla
text: Great place

name: Paul Campbell
text: Friendly staff and delicious pizza and wings. Every pizza store sometimes falters and lets a sub-standard pie out of the door, but it's pretty rare here.

name: Scott S
text: Great neiborhood pizza place. In and out 10 min. A++

name: Mark Sweetman
text: My kids love their pies, otherwise I would skip it.

name: Mark Kalesky
text: Call in doesn't work. Use the online app or just show up like I did. 10 bucks and some change for 2 larges. Not bad...

name: Home Source Detroit
text: Never answer the phone. I've called 4 times today and they act like they can't answer the phone. The one on merriman and ann arbor does. Won't waste my time with this one anymore.

name: Kevin Chattin
text:
Not bad  not great. Closed
During the day. Why someone would want to lose sales during lunch hours I don't know
